Uses of Class
commands.Command

  • Packages that use Command 
    Package Description
    commands
    Title: commands
    The following package holds all classes related to the command functionality of the Binary Puzzle Assistant (BPA).
    model
    Title: model
    The following package holds all classes related to the model of the Binary Puzzle Assistant (BPA).
    solvers
    Title: solvers
    The following package holds all classes related to the solvers of the Binary Puzzle Assistant (BPA).

    • Uses of Command in commands

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommandCellLocked
      A Command with the CommandType being CHANGELOCKED
      class  CommandCellReplace
      A Command with the CommandType being REPLACEVALUE
      class  CompoundCommand<Symbol>
      An CompoundCommand of Commands
      Methods in commands that return Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Command CompoundCommand.get(int i)
      Get the action at index i
      Methods in commands with parameters of type Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CompoundCommand.add(Command a)
      Adds an action to the list

    • Uses of Command in model

      Methods in model with parameters of type Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Grid.applyAction(Command a, boolean stored)
      Applies a certain action.

    • Uses of Command in solvers

      Methods in solvers that return Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Command ContradictionStrategy.apply(Cell cell, Grid grid)
      Applies a contradiciton strategy to a given cell
      Command LineStrategy.apply(Cell cell, Grid grid)
      Applies a line strategy to a given cell
      Command Strategy.apply(Cell cell, Grid grid)
      Applies a certain strategy to a cell, with relation to the group
      Command TripletStrategy.apply(Cell cell, Grid grid)
      Applies a triplet strategy to a given cell
      Command DecoratorStrategy.find(Grid grid, java.util.ArrayList<Strategy> strategies)
      Finds an strategy in a list of given strategies to apply to an empty cell
